Text: The nfo says the languages are "ENG,GER". The game is in french. How can I set the language to english?
I Have The Same Problem Only French Has Anyone Got A Fix For This?
i went though every menu option and not seen anything that can change the language

Well, I'd say this torrent is mis-advertised. It said "ENG, GER" and I speak both English and German. But French, I do not speak. If you speak English, until the uploader tells how to change the language, DO NOT download this torrent.

Uploaded English version here for you guys. Enjoy.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6390425
it's in fucking FREENCH!! there's no english or german mode...

Its REAL, but DONT DOWNLOAD
It a pssy French speak...

For English just edit language.config under BLES01304\PS3_GAME\USRDIR\platform\ps3

You can open and edit it with notepad.

Sorry guys for mess up.

this game works and is in french, I couldn't change language.config with notepad from folder but it can be downloaded if you look hard enough with google. I currently have this game running in English thanx to a download that I found by searching google and deleting the original language.config  and replacing it with downloaded one. Hope this helps.
Shaun , it can be changed with notepad , just replace the french there with english
